name: Recall
description:
Recall is a deep strategy game from the designers of Revive, focusing on engine building and exploration.  
Lead your tribe, explore the lands, and discover traces of ancient civilizations to learn from them.

Each player begins the game with one of 14 unique tribes and one of 18 unique gadgets which both will heavily influence your strategy and opportunities.

On your turn, you either:
Use a keycard to activate an action box. 
Or
Recall, to produce resources and regain your keycards.

When you use a keycard you activate the abilities of the keycard itself and the effects of the chosen action box. The chosen combination of keycard and action box will therefore determine what you get to do on your turn: Populate the lands. Move your followers. Explore new regions. Build workshops, vaults or monuments.

During the game you will improve your tribe by acquiring new keycards, upgrading your action boxes, or collecting ability stones and relics.

An important part of the game is to search dig sites for traces of ancient civilizations. This unlocks access to the abilities and gadgets of the ancient tribes as well as providing important scoring opportunities.

Three times during the game, players must choose one of two paths: The chosen path provides an immediate bonus, as well as boosting one of the end game scoring categories.

By using the optional digital companion website, players can archive their tribes at the end of their game – making their tribes discoverable as ancient civilizations in other players’ games.

—description from the designer
